title: The Teacher
short_cast: Amala Paul, Hakkim Shah, Chemban Vinod Jose, Manju Pillai, I.M. Vijayan, Prashanth Murali, Anumol, Shajeer P Basheer
cast: Amala Paul, Hakkim Shah, Chemban Vinod Jose, Manju Pillai, I.M. Vijayan, Prashanth Murali, Anumol, Shajeer P Basheer
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: A physical education teacher navigates the brutal aftermath of a sexual assault as she grapples with her husband’s indifference and a thirst for revenge.
